subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Another plane prediction?
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
A bomb in the upper atmosphere would cover a very wide range. It would also
not go unnoticed.

I have seen speculation of testing of an electromagnetic weapon such as the
millimeter-wave devices talked about a year or so ago in various places.
These would be aimed at a specific target area that would not be too big. It
would not be noticed by anyone.

Zack
